qas.question: Radio broadcasts and what help deter corruption?
What country is used as an example for limited forms of communications?
Who works against corruption in India?
What new ombudsman bill is being readied in India?

context: <a0_0>Mobile telecommunications<a0_0/> and radio broadcasting help to fight corruption, especially in developing regions like <a1_0>Africa<a1_0/>, where other forms of communications are limited. In India, <a2_0>the anti-corruption bureau<a2_0/> fights against corruption, and a new ombudsman bill called <a3_0>Jan Lokpal Bill<a3_0/> is being prepared.
